des:
To get started, please ensure you have the proper hardware and accessories. Please contact Customer Service if you have any questions. 

Automated Smart Shades merges seamlessly with Alexa to bring enhanced operation of popular LEVOLOR PREMIER window coverings to your connected lifestyle. 

Smart Shades works with Alexa to allow you to voice-activate individual shades, Rooms of shades, or specific Smart Shade Scenes created in the LEVOLOR PREMIER App. 

Simply speak “Alexa" followed by the activation words "Activate", "Open", or "Close", and then the shade name, Room, or Smart Shade Scene name. 

Some example phrases are: 

Individual Shade Command Examples 
"Alexa, Open Bedroom Left." 
“Alexa, Set Kitchen Right tilt to 50 percent.” 
 
Room Command Examples 
"Alexa, Close Living Room." 

Scene Command Examples 
"Alexa, Activate 'I'm Leaving.'" 
“Alexa, Run “Movie Night.” 

Below are some tips for success when voice-activating Automated Smart Shades using the LEVOLOR PREMIER skill for Alexa: 

- Make sure shade names, Rooms, and Scene names are unique 
- Make your shade names, Rooms, and Scene names easy to pronounce 
- Use Routines to combine multiple shades, Rooms of shades, or specific Smart Shade Scenes with other devices for whole-home automation 
 
In order to use the LEVOLOR PREMIER skill for Alexa to voice-activate your Automated Smart Shades, you'll need the following: 

Account Requirements: An account in the LEVOLOR PREMIER app with a Gateway (setup is done in the app.) This ensures seamless account linking with Alexa.
 
For more information visit: www.levolor.com/Premier
